com.eteks.sweethome3d.io

Class ContentDigestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eteks.sweethome3d.io.ContentDigestManager

  • public class ContentDigestManager
extends Object
    Manager able to store and compute content digest to compare content data faster.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Puybaret

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(Content content1, Content content2)
      Returns true if the contents in parameter contains the same data, comparing their digest.
      byte[] getContentDigest(Content content)
      Returns the SHA-1 digest of the given content, computing it if it wasn't set.
      static ContentDigestManager getInstance()
      Returns an instance of this singleton.
      boolean isContentDigestEqual(Content content, byte[] digest)
      Returns true if the digest of the given content is equal to digest.
      void setContentDigest(Content content, byte[] digest)
      Sets the SHA-1 digest of the given content.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ContentDigestManager getInstance()
        Returns an instance of this singleton.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Content content1,
                      Content content2)
        Returns true if the contents in parameter contains the same data, comparing their digest. If the digest of the contents was not set directly, it will be computed on the fly.

      • isContentDigestEqual

        public boolean isContentDigestEqual(Content content,
                                    byte[] digest)
        Returns true if the digest of the given content is equal to digest.

      • setContentDigest

        public void setContentDigest(Content content,
                             byte[] digest)
        Sets the SHA-1 digest of the given content.

      • getContentDigest

        public byte[] getContentDigest(Content content)
        Returns the SHA-1 digest of the given content, computing it if it wasn't set.
